name: Join the Agglomeration!
description:
Created in 48 hours for the 2021 GMTK game jam.  The theme is "Joined Together" and in this game, your goal is to join together all the blobs in each level to continue to the next.  

Everything made by me -- graphics are made from clay (I do wish I was more of an artist, but also the game was literally just solid color blocks with no background until the last couple of hours).  Music made in Korg Gadget for Nintendo Switch.
